Articles.Content: Floor 4499: A supply depot of oxygen masks and air tanks. A small sign reads: "Turns out you are 2625 stories above the Death Zone. Congratulations on surviving so long! You either have very large lungs, have this equipment already, or don't need to breathe. Just in case, here's some air!"

Floor 4500: more kitties still! Also a sign saying new page!

210911202023

Floor 4501: The kittens have followed you upstairs and have entered a mock battle that turns out to be exactly the Battle of Gettysburg in cat-scale. A tuxedo cat with a black tuft of fur on his chin and a top hat is sitting on a podium, saying: "Meow-score and seven meows ago..."

Floor 4502: a theater showing Dogma on 300 screens.

222111202023
Floor 4503: A movie about the medieval alchemists: Transformers.
Floor 4502: a theater showing the movie Catma
Floor 4503: a theater showing the movie Top Gun: Maverick.
Floor 4505: strategos

Floor 4506: an ocean of sour cream

011211222023
Floor 4507: an extremely surreal world of mathematics. You must find the value of X before you can cintinue upwards
Floor 4508: You got past the floor below by pointing to x and saying "Here it is! I found x!" This current floor wants you to find y, and you use the same technique.

Floor 4509: A long table fully set and trimmed. On the table is a full Thanksgiving Dinner. 
194711222023
Floor 4510: The Thanksgiving Dinner, sitting on the table, keeps dinning and giving thanks.
Floor 4511: It's full of cranberry sauce...
Floor 4512: The restaurant at the end of the Unifloor.
Floor 4513: The restaurant orchestra.
Floor 4514: A training facility for the Artemis II astronauts.
Floor 4514: The SLS for said astronauts.

Floor 4515: the viewing platform for watching SLS go fly.

184111252023
Floor 4516: A live view of the Artemis III astronauts descending from the HLS onto the surface for the first time in over 50 years. Truly a monumental moment.

Floor 4517: a bed for Napkin to have his nap on.

isnt Napkin cute?

211311252023
Floor 4518: literally Tuonela, the afterlife of finnish mythology (not really "life", your soul just kinda goes to sleep forever there)

Floor 4519: a cozy room with a roaring fire in a fireplace. A rocker for you to relax in. Unlimited hot cocoa. Soft christmas music (no vocals) plays in the background. You look around and see a window. In the window you see snow gently falling outside.

135811262023

Floor 4520: The Artemis Lunar Gateway station.

Spoiler

Isn't it so cool to be alive right now? We're really going back to the moon and this time we're gonna stay! It's such an awesome feeling!
